name: DoctorAlex
0:
”Alexa, open Doctor Alex”
”Alexa, tell Doctor Alex, I have fever”
”Alexa, tell Doctor Alex, I am feeling nausea”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doctor alex
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Not Feeling well? Need a Medical Advice? Ask Doctor Alex by saying “Alexa, tell Doctor Alex, I have Fever”
Using the Doctor Alex skill, you can tell your symptoms/problems and Doctor Alex skill will help you identify your probable disease or issue.
Enable the Doctor Alex skill on your Alexa Device just by saying, "Enable Doctor Alex"

Tell Doctor Alex what you are feeling and he will tell you what issues you can have with a detailed information about the problem and also it's treatment.
Doctor Alex is a complete Medical advisor for you inside your Alexa device, with every possible symptom and corresponding issues this skill can help you identify all common diseases alongwith easy treatment.
Doctor Alex skill is powered by an intelligent AI engine which identifies issues based on your symptoms from a medically approved database of information.

Start using the Doctor Alex skill by saying any of the following, 
"Alexa, open Doctor Alex"
"Alexa, tell Doctor Alex, I have fever"
"Alexa, tell Doctor Alex, I am feeling nausea"

Disclaimer: This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

Enable Doctor Alex skill now and stay healthy.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
